name: Hip Skirt, cotton Lycra Tushi Tail
description:
Lycra overskirt featuring shibori dyed pattern. Ties at the hip creating a cool little tushi cover.

These are designed to go over a pair of pants or a skirt. 

They have been created to go with my straight leg pants but you can wear a tushi-tie with whatever you want.

This is made from quality cotton lycra with a shibori dyed design (that's a fancy kind of tie-dye technique)

These tushi-tie skirts are made to order, please add another week to delivery time. The shibori dyeing is not an exact science so your tushi-tie will look similar BUT NOT THE SAME as the pictures, some variation in pattern and color.

IMPORTANT. PLEASE READ. YOU MUST MAKE 2 CHOICES>>>
1. Please choose the color you like and send me a message via the contact tab on the menu on the left.

2. Please choose a size from the dropdown menu (see the measurements below). The lycra has a good stretch to it, so choose the sizing closest to yours. These are designed to sit on the hips just below the waist.

XS 
natural waist 24 - 26 in (61-66cm)
waist band 30 - 32 in (76-81cm)
hip (widest part) 34 - 36 in (86-91cm)

SMALL 
natural waist 26 - 28 in (66-71cm)
waist band 32 - 34 in (81-86cm)
hip (widest part) 36 - 38 in (91-96cm)

MEDIUM 
natural waist 28 - 30 in (71-76cm)
waist band 34 - 36 in (86-91cm)
hip (widest part) 38 - 40 in (96-102cm)

LARGE 
natural waist 31 - 33 in (79-84cm)
waist band 37- 39 in (94-99cm)
hip (widest part) 41 - 43 in (104-109cm) 

XL (14 - 16)
natural waist 32 - 34 in (81-86cm)
waist band 40- 42 in (102-107cm)
hip (widest part) 44 - 46 in (112-117cm)

Care is easy, very gentle handwash in cold water. Hang in shade to dry. 

Please note: the listing is for the hip skirt only, the pants are listed seperately.

Have a look at my other textiles here

https://www.etsy.com/shop/BeljaysFeltnArt

name: Tushi Tie, Bellydance Hip Skirt
description:
Lycra and silk overskirt. Ties at the hip creating a cool little tushi cover.

These are designed to go over a pair of pants or a skirt. They can be worn down to the knees or folded at the top to create a shorter tushi-tie.

They have been created to go with my silk flare pants,
but you can wear a tushi-tie with whatever you want.

The main part is a cotton lycra with a shibori dyed design and it is edged with a silk ruffle to give your tushi movement a little pizzaz.

These tushi-tie skirts are made to order, please add another week to delivery time. The shibori dyeing is not an exact science so your tushi-tie will look similar BUT NOT THE SAME as the pictures, some variation in pattern and color.

IMPORTANT. PLEASE READ. YOU MUST MAKE 2 CHOICES>>>
1. Please choose a colour. I do purples, reds or greens similar to the flared pants listed here or take a look at the colours of the scarves I have listed in my etsy store
http://www.etsy.com/shop/BeljaysFeltnArt?section_id=12058961
 and leave a message about the kinds of colours you want via the "contact" tab on the menu at the left..

2. Please choose a size from the dropdown menu (see the measurements below). The lycra has a good stretch to it, so choose the sizing closest to yours. These are designed to sit on the hips just below the waist.

XS 
natural waist 24 - 26 in (61-66cm)
waist band 30 - 32 in (76-81cm)
hip (widest part) 34 - 36 in (86-91cm)

SMALL 
natural waist 26 - 28 in (66-71cm)
waist band 32 - 34 in (81-86cm)
hip (widest part) 36 - 38 in (91-96cm)

MEDIUM 
natural waist 28 - 30 in (71-76cm)
waist band 34 - 36 in (86-91cm)
hip (widest part) 38 - 40 in (96-102cm)

LARGE 
natural waist 31 - 33 in (79-84cm)
waist band 37- 39 in (94-99cm)
hip (widest part) 41 - 43 in (104-109cm) 

XL (14 - 16)
natural waist 32 - 34 in (81-86cm)
waist band 40- 42 in (102-107cm)
hip (widest part) 44 - 46 in (112-117cm)

Please note, this listing is for the Tushi Tie only. th pants are listed seperately.

Care is easy, very gentle handwash in cold water. Hang in shade to dry. Give the silk a press with an iron set on low. If you want to get wrinkles out of the silk, use a fine water spray to slightly dampen and then press.

Go to 
https://www.etsy.com/shop/BeljaysFeltnArt

for more of my textile work

name: Belly Dance, Yoga, Straight Leg Pants
description:
Tribal Belly Dance, Yoga, Straight Leg Pants

You are purchasing a custom made item with Turquoise shibori details (please note models in pics are wearing turquoise or violet). 

Fantastic for belly dance, tribal belly dance, flamenco, modern dance styles or just for the sheer enjoyment of it.

Made from quality cotton lycra. Black with your choice of color in the shibori detail down the sides.

These pants are made to order, please add another week to delivery time. The shibori dyeing is not an exact science so your pants will look similar BUT NOT THE SAME as the pictures, some variations in pattern and color.

IMPORTANT. PLEASE READ. YOU MUST MAKE 3 CHOICES>>>
1.        Please choose a size from the dropdown menu (see the measurements below). The lycra has a good stretch to it, so choose the sizing closest to yours. The waistband sits on the hips just below the waist.

XS 
natural waist 24 - 26 in  (61-66cm)
waist band 30 - 32 in    (76-81cm)
hip (widest part) 34 - 36 in   (86-91cm)

SMALL 
natural waist 26 - 28 in   (66-71cm)
waist band 32 - 34 in   (81-86cm)
hip (widest part) 36 - 38 in   (91-96cm)

MEDIUM 
natural waist 28 - 30 in   (71-76cm)
waist band 34 - 36 in   (86-91cm)
hip (widest part) 38 - 40 in   (96-102cm)

LARGE 
natural waist 31 - 33 in   (79-84cm)
waist band 37- 39 in   (94-99cm)
hip (widest part) 41 - 43 in   (104-109cm) 

XL (14 - 16)
natural waist 32 - 34 in   (81-86cm)
waist band 40- 42 in   (102-107cm)
hip (widest part) 44 - 46 in   (112-117cm)

2.	Please measure your inside leg seam measurement. This is important, if they are made too long you will trip over them and if you trim off the bottom you will lose some of the design. If they are too short it just looks silly. GET SOMEONE ELSE TO MEASURE FROM YOUR CROTCH TO THE LENGTH YOU WANT (usually Â½ inch off the floor). If you want to wear them with heels, wear them when being measured. Go to "Contact" and send me a message with your name and your inside leg measurement 

3. When you send me the info about your leg measurement, tell me the color you would like. 

Take a look at my other textiles here
https://www.etsy.com/shop/BeljaysFeltnArt

Care is easy, very gentle  separate handwash in cold water. Hang in shade to dry.

categories.name: Shibori Dyed Lycra Pants - Straight Leg

name: Tribal Belly Dance Silk Flare Pants CUSTOM MADE
description:
Tribal Belly Dance Silk Flare Pants

Fantastic for belly dance, tribal belly dance, flamenco, modern dance styles or just for the sheer enjoyment of it.

Upper part is a quality cotton lycra in black.
The lower flare is made from shibori dyed silk. It feels fabulous floating around your calves as you move and looks beautiful and flowing.

THESE PANTS ARE MADE TO ORDER, please add another week to delivery time. The shibori dyeing is not an exact science so your pants will look similar BUT NOT THE SAME as the pictures, some variation in pattern and color.

IMPORTANT. PLEASE READ. 
1.	Please choose a size from the measurements below. The lycra has a good stretch to it, so choose the sizing closest to yours. The waistband sits on the hips just below the natural waist. SELECT YOUR SIZE IN THE OPTIONS BOX

XS 
natural waist 24 - 26 in  (61-66cm)
waist band 30 - 32 in    (76-81cm)
hip (widest part) 34 - 36 in   (86-91cm)

SMALL 
natural waist 26 - 28 in   (66-71cm)
waist band 32 - 34 in   (81-86cm)
hip (widest part) 36 - 38 in   (91-96cm)

MEDIUM 
natural waist 28 - 30 in   (71-76cm)
waist band 34 - 36 in   (86-91cm)
hip (widest part) 38 - 40 in   (96-102cm)

LARGE 
natural waist 31 - 33 in   (79-84cm)
waist band 37- 39 in   (94-99cm)
hip (widest part) 41 - 43 in   (104-109cm) 

XL (14 - 16)
natural waist 32 - 34 in   (81-86cm)
waist band 40- 42 in   (102-107cm)
hip (widest part) 44 - 46 in   (112-117cm)

2.	Please measure your inside leg seam measurement. This is important, if they are made too long you will trip over them and if you trim off the bottom you will lose some of the design. If they are too short it just looks silly. GET SOMEONE ELSE TO MEASURE FROM YOUR CROTCH TO THE FLOOR. Go into contact on menu and send this measurement to me along with your name, which style of pants you are ordering and the colors you would like the silk to be.

To get an idea of the possible color ranges, go to my etsy shop 

https://www.etsy.com/shop/BeljaysFeltnArt

and have a look at the silk scarves
